Sometimes polotics, sometimes rolefights, sometimes Randmasuour....

And then sex.  [/bq]
Speaking of which here's your daily news:
You know how politicians keep trying to make it harder to vote so they can pretty much steal a election by only letting groups they want to vote do the voting?  Well there's been a breakthrough on how to stop this shit; the 26'th amendment.

Basically the people that made these voter laws probably should have read the constitution and the amendments before trying to make them cause there's a very good chance that these laws will start getting slapped down and potentially head towards the supreme court.

Tl:dr;  A couple states went derp and didn't think anyone would contest the legality of the laws they made then were shocked when people took them to court.
